text.value:
UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = SYSUTCDATETIME()
FROM dbo.DimPolicy dim
JOIN stg.Policy stg 
    ON dim.PolicyId = stg.PolicyId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Number, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Number, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PolicySegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicySegmentId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PolicyType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicyTypeId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.RefundType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.RefundProtocol, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PremiumFrequency, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PremiumFrequencyID, '')
  );

  
INSERT INTO dbo.DimPolicy (
    PolicyId,
    Name,
    Number,
    PolicySegment,
    PolicyType,
    RefundType,
    PremiumFrequency,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.PolicyId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Number,
    stg.PolicySegmentId,
    stg.PolicyTypeId,
    stg.RefundProtocol,
    stg.PremiumFrequencyId,
    stg.CreatedOn,       -- ðŸ‘ˆ Use source-created date as ValidFrom
    NULL,                -- ValidTo open
    1,                   -- IsActive
    SYSUTCDATETIME()     -- LoadDate (when loaded into warehouse)
FROM stg.Policy stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimPolicy dim 
    ON dim.PolicyId = stg.PolicyId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.PolicyId IS NULL
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Number, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Number, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PolicySegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicySegmentId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PolicyType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicyTypeId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.RefundType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.RefundProtocol, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PremiumFrequency, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PremiumFrequencyId, '')
    );

UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimCarrier dim
JOIN stg.Carrier stg 
    ON dim.CarrierId = stg.CarrierId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.CustomerCareEmail, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CustomerCareEmail, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1)
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimCarrier (
    CarrierId,
    Name,
    Code,
    CustomerCareEmail,
    AddressId,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.CarrierId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Code,
    stg.CustomerCareEmail,
    stg.AddressId,
    CreatedOn,  -- ValidFrom = ETL load time (or use source.CreatedOn if available)
    NULL,               -- ValidTo open for active records
    1,                  -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()    -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Carrier stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimCarrier dim 
    ON dim.CarrierId = stg.CarrierId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.CarrierId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.CustomerCareEmail, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CustomerCareEmail, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1)
    );

UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimClient dim
JOIN stg.Client stg 
    ON dim.ClientId = stg.ClientId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ClientSegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientSegmentId, '') OR  -- Compare NAMES, not IDs!
      ISNULL(dim.Industry, '') <> ISNULL(stg.IndustryId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ClientType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientTypeId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.SalesPerson, '') <> ISNULL(stg.SalesPerson, '')
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimClient (
    ClientId,
    Name,
    Code,
    ClientSegment,
    Industry,
    ClientType,
    SalesPerson,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.ClientId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Code,
    stg.ClientSegmentId,
    stg.IndustryId,
    stg.ClientTypeId,
    stg.SalesPerson,
    stg.CreatedOn,  -- Use source.CreatedOn if available
    NULL,               -- ValidTo = NULL for active records
    1,                  -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()    -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Client stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimClient dim 
    ON dim.ClientId = stg.ClientId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.ClientId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ClientSegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientSegmentId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Industry, '') <> ISNULL(stg.IndustryId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ClientType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientTypeId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.SalesPerson, '') <> ISNULL(stg.SalesPerson, '')
    );

-- STEP 1: Expire outdated records
UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimMember dim
JOIN stg.Member stg 
    ON dim.MemberId = stg.MemberId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Email, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Email, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.DOB, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.DOB, '1900-01-01') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ParentMemberId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.ParentMemberId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.DependantType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.DependantType, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Gender, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Gender, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.MaritalStatus, '') <> ISNULL(stg.MaritalStatus, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.NationalityId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.NationalityId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.BasicSalary, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.BasicSalary, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.CostCenter, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CostCenter, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.JobGrade, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobGrade, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.JobPosition, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobPosition, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01')
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimMember (
    MemberId,
    FullName,
    Email,
    DOB,
    ParentMemberId,
    DependantType,
    Gender,
    MaritalStatus,
    AddressId,
    NationalityId,
    BasicSalary,
    CostCenter,
    JobGrade,
    JobPosition,
    EmploymentDate,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.MemberId,
	TRIM(
        CONCAT_WS(' ', 
            NULLIF(TRIM(FirstName), ''),
            NULLIF(TRIM(MiddleName), ''),
            NULLIF(TRIM(LastName), '')
        )
    ) AS FullName,
    stg.Email,
    stg.DOB,
    stg.ParentMemberId,
    stg.DependantType,
    stg.Gender,
    stg.MaritalStatus,
    stg.AddressId,
    stg.NationalityId,
    stg.BasicSalary,
    stg.CostCenter,
    stg.JobGrade,
    stg.JobPosition,
    stg.EmploymentDate,
    stg.CreatedDate,       -- Use source.CreatedDate as ValidFrom
    NULL,                  -- ValidTo = NULL for active records
    1,                     -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()       -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Member stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimMember dim 
    ON dim.MemberId = stg.MemberId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.MemberId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Email, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Email, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.DOB, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.DOB, '1900-01-01') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ParentMemberId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.ParentMemberId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.DependantType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.DependantType, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Gender, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Gender, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.MaritalStatus, '') <> ISNULL(stg.MaritalStatus, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.NationalityId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.NationalityId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.BasicSalary, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.BasicSalary, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.CostCenter, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CostCenter, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.JobGrade, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobGrade, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.JobPosition, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobPosition, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01')
    );

INSERT INTO dbo.FactWorkflow (
    WorkflowId,
    MemberSK,
    PolicySK,
    CreatedOn,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stag.WorkflowId,
    member.DimMemberSK,
    policy.DimPolicySK,
    stag.CreatedOn,
    GETUTCDATE()
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        w.WorkflowId,
        mwl.MemberId,
        mwl.PolicyId,
        w.CreatedOn
    FROM stg.Workflow w
    JOIN stg.MemberWorkflowLog mwl ON w.WorkflowId = mwl.WorkflowId
    JOIN stg.Policy p ON p.PolicyId = mwl.PolicyId
) stag

-- Match Member at point-in-time
JOIN dbo.DimMember member 
    ON stag.MemberId = member.MemberId 
    AND stag.CreatedOn BETWEEN member.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(member.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND member.IsActive = 1

-- Match Policy at point-in-time
JOIN dbo.DimPolicy policy 
    ON stag.PolicyId = policy.PolicyId 
    AND stag.CreatedOn BETWEEN policy.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(policy.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND policy.IsActive = 1

-- Prevent duplicates
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM dbo.FactWorkflow f 
    WHERE f.WorkflowId = stag.WorkflowId
);

INSERT INTO dbo.FactMedicalClaim (
    MedicalClaimId,
    MemberSK,
    InsurerClaimNumber,
    InternalClaimNumber,
    AmountClaimed,
    PaymentTypeId,
    AmountSettled,
    DateReceived,
    MedicalClaimStatusId,
    AmountReAssessed,
    SettlementDate,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT 
    stg.MedicalClaimId,
    dm.DimMemberSK,
    stg.InsurerClaimNumber,
    stg.InternalClaimNumber,
    stg.AmountClaimed,
    stg.PaymentTypeId,
    stg.AmountSettled,
    stg.DateReceived,
    stg.MedicalClaimStatusId,
    stg.AmountReAssessed,
    stg.SettlementDate,
    GETUTCDATE()
FROM stg.MedicalClaim stg
JOIN dbo.DimMember dm
    ON stg.MemberId = dm.MemberId 
    AND stg.DateReceived BETWEEN dm.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(dm.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND dm.IsActive = 1
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM dbo.FactMedicalClaim fc 
    WHERE fc.MedicalClaimId = stg.MedicalClaimId
);

INSERT INTO dbo.FactPolicy (
    PolicySK,
    ClientSK,
    CarrierSK,
    Country,
    CategoryName,
    Product,
    BaseCurrencyName,
    Premium,
    Commission,
    Fee,
    ClientFee,
    MembersCount,
    ActiveMembers,
    ActiveEmployees,
    TotalBasmahFee,
    PolicyStartDate,
    PolicyEndDate,
    CommissionPercent,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT 
    p.DimPolicySK AS PolicyId,
    client.DimClientSK,
    carrier.DimCarrierSK,
    sp.Country,
    sp.CategoryName,
    sp.Product,
    sp.BaseCurrencyName,
    sp.Premium,
    sp.Commission,
    sp.Fee,
    sp.ClientFee,
    sp.MembersCount,
    sp.ActiveMembers,
    sp.ActiveEmployes,
    sp.TotalBasmahFee,
    sp.PolicyStartDate,
    sp.PolicyEndDate,
    sp.CommissionPercent,
    GETUTCDATE() AS LoadDate

FROM stg.spPolicy sp
JOIN stg.Policy pol ON sp.PolicyId = pol.PolicyId
JOIN dbo.DimPolicy p ON sp.PolicyId = p.PolicyId
JOIN dbo.DimClient client ON pol.ClientId = client.ClientId AND client.IsActive = 1
JOIN dbo.DimCarrier carrier ON pol.CarrierId = carrier.CarrierId AND carrier.IsActive = 1

-- Only insert if no matching row with same data exists
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM dbo.FactPolicy fp
    WHERE fp.PolicySK = p.DimPolicySK
      AND ISNULL(fp.ClientSK, -1) = ISNULL(client.DimClientSK, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.CarrierSK, -1) = ISNULL(carrier.DimCarrierSK, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Country, '') = ISNULL(sp.Country, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.CategoryName, '') = ISNULL(sp.CategoryName, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.Product, '') = ISNULL(sp.Product, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.BaseCurrencyName, '') = ISNULL(sp.BaseCurrencyName, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.Premium, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Premium, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Commission, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Commission, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Fee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Fee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ClientFee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ClientFee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.MembersCount, -1) = ISNULL(sp.MembersCount, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ActiveMembers, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ActiveMembers, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ActiveEmployees, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ActiveEmployes, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.TotalBasmahFee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.TotalBasmahFee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.PolicyStartDate, '1900-01-01') = ISNULL(sp.PolicyStartDate, '1900-01-01')
      AND ISNULL(fp.PolicyEndDate, '1900-01-01') = ISNULL(sp.PolicyEndDate, '1900-01-01')
      AND ISNULL(fp.CommissionPercent, -1) = ISNULL(sp.CommissionPercent, -1)
);

@concat(
  'UPDATE dbo.IncrementalLoadMetadata SET LastLoadedValue = (SELECT MAX(', 
  item().IncrementalColumn, 
  ') FROM ', 
  item().TableName,
  ') WHERE TableName = ''', 
  item().TableName, 
  ''''
)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'SELECT * FROM [',
    item().TableName,
    '] WHERE CreatedOn > ''',
    item().LastLoadTime,
    ''' OR UpdatedOn > ''',
    item().LastLoadTime,
    ''''
)

text.value:
UPDATE stg.etlControl
SET LastLoadTime = GETUTCDATE()
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}'
